data.title: GREY'S ANATOMY
data.meta_description: motion picture |   Made-for-TV series.   Medium length film (30-60 minutes).   In segment (2005) "The Christmas song" by Robert Wells, Mel Torm√©, performed by Nat King Cole; "Santa Claus is comin' to town" by Haven Gillespie, J. Fred Coots, performed by Lou Rawls. In segment (21.09.06) "Gone, daddy, gone" by Gordon Gano, performed by Willie Dixon. In segment (16.11.06) "God bless the child" by Arthur Herzog, Jr., Billie Holiday, performed by Chandra Wilson. In segment (19.04.12) "My funny Valentine" by Richard Rodgers, Lorenz Hart, performed by Ella Fitzgerald. (Songs).   Diahann Carroll as Jane Burke in five segments. (Personnel On Camera).   Motion Picture (Form).
